Derek Acorah's remarkable gift has allowed him to enter a world inaccessible to most a world inhabited by the spirits of loved ones who have gone before us. Enjoy front row seats for Derek's nationwide tour as he connects to the 'other side' with the help of his spirit guide Sam, and delivers messages of love, hope and understanding. Amazed audience members are connected to family members and friends who have passed on and who offer wisdom, advice and comfort from beyond. A truly extraordinary programme in the presence of a truly extraordinary man. Included in the bonus features is an intimate 70 minute interview with Derek in the privacy and comfort of his own home. Derek openly and honestly answers all the questions his legions of fans regularly ask as he tours the country some with surprising answers! FREE CD To accompany this DVD event is a CD of music inspired by Derek's work which was specially created for him with his personal involvement to ensure it is in harmony with the spirit world. The 10 tracks selected offer the perfect ambiance for a peaceful, uplifting and spiritual experience.
